backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining Client, Task, Assignee, and Todo types with full CRUD operations, access control via MixinAuthorization, and per-user data storage using nested Maps keyed by Principal.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three completed features: Todo CRUD operations, Todo bulk operations (CSV upload/delete), and displaying captain names alongside assignee names in task views.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend source files covering routing, authentication, CRUD pages for clients/tasks/assignees/todos, bulk operations, Excel/CSV export, and React Query hooks with optimistic updates.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for background, foreground, primary, secondary, muted, destructive, borders, charts, and sidebar components.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with CSWA favicon, viewport meta tag, page title, root div, and module script loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app with TanStack Router setup defining routes for dashboard, clients, tasks, assignees, and todos; includes authentication checks, profile setup modal, loading states, and deferred URL cleanup hook.
frontend/src/components/assignees/Assign: Dialog component for bulk uploading assignees via CSV with template download, file parsing, validation error display, preview table, and submission using useBulkCreateAssignees hook.

Dialog component for creating, editing, and deleting assignees (teams) with form validation for name and captain fields. Includes confirmation dialog for deletion and uses React Query mutations for backend operations.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog that prompts new users to enter their name during initial profile setup. Cannot be dismissed and submits the name to save the user profile.
frontend/src/components/auth/SignedOutSc: Landing page for unauthenticated users featuring CSWA branding, sign-in button via Internet Identity, and three feature cards highlighting client management, task tracking, and dashboard insights.
frontend/src/components/clients/ClientBu: Dialog for bulk uploading clients via CSV file with template download, file parsing, validation error display, and preview table. Uses React Query mutation to create multiple clients at once.
frontend/src/components/clients/ClientFo: Dialog component for creating, editing, and deleting individual clients with fields for name, GSTIN, PAN, and notes. Includes form validation and delete confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/components/errors/AppStartu: React error boundary component that catches startup errors and displays a fallback error screen. Logs errors to console for debugging.
frontend/src/components/errors/StartupEr: Error fallback UI displaying an error icon, message, and reload button when the application fails to start properly.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main application layout with sticky header, navigation sidebar (desktop) and mobile sheet menu, user avatar dropdown with logout, and navigation links for Dashboard, Clients, Tasks, Assignees, and Todos.
frontend/src/components/tasks/InlineComm: Inline editor component for task comments with edit/save/cancel controls, supporting keyboard shortcuts (Enter to save, Escape to cancel) and displaying error messages.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskBulkEd: Dialog for bulk editing multiple tasks at once, currently supporting status updates with an unchanged sentinel value to skip fields.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskBulkUp: Dialog for bulk uploading tasks via CSV file with template download, file parsing, validation preview, and sequential task creation with success/error handling.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskDetail: Card component displaying comprehensive task details including client info, status, assignments, dates, financial data, and comments in a structured grid layout.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskFormDi: Dialog form for creating or editing tasks with all fields (client, category, status, dates, financials, etc.), handling form state and validation with create/update mutations.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskQuickS: Dropdown select component for quickly changing a task's status inline, triggering an update mutation with all existing task fields preserved.
frontend/src/components/todos/TodoBulkUp: Dialog for bulk uploading todos via CSV with template generation, file parsing, validation preview table, and bulk creation with success/error feedback.
frontend/src/components/todos/TodoFormDi: Dialog component for creating and editing todos with form fields for title, description, completed status, priority, and due date. Includes delete functionality with confirmation dialog and uses React Query mutations for CRUD operations.
frontend/src/constants/taskStatus.ts: Defines allowed task statuses (Pending, Docs Pending, In Progress, Checking, Payment Pending, Completed, Hold) and provides utility functions for normalizing, validating, and mapping legacy status values.
frontend/src/hooks/assignees.ts: React Query hooks for assignee CRUD operations including getAll, get, create, update, delete, and bulkCreate. Implements optimistic updates for mutations and automatic query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/clients.ts: React Query hooks for client CRUD operations including getAll, get, create, update, delete, and bulkCreate. Features optimistic updates with rollback on error and query cache management.
frontend/src/hooks/tasks.ts: React Query hooks for task operations including getAllTasksWithCaptain, getTask, createTask, and updateTask with comprehensive field updates. Implements optimistic updates for the tasks list and individual task queries.
frontend/src/hooks/todos.ts: React Query hooks for todo CRUD operations including getAll, get, create, update, delete, and bulkCreate. Features optimistic updates with error rollback and automatic timestamp management.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous actor instance for backend communication, initializing access control with an admin token from URL parameters and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Provides React hooks for fetching and saving the current user's profile using React Query, with proper error handling and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeferredUrlCleanup: React hook that captures secret parameters (like caffeineAdminToken) from URL hash, stores them in sessionStorage, and removes them from the URL after component mount to prevent router initialization issues.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a warm neutral color palette with sage green accents for both light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/dataParser.ts: Deprecated utility functions for parsing and encoding client data; now obsolete as client data is stored directly without encoding in the new backend model.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AssigneesPage.tsx: Page component for managing assignees with search, bulk selection, bulk delete, and edit functionality, displaying assignees in a table with captain information.
frontend/src/pages/ClientDetailPage.tsx: Page component displaying detailed client information including GSTIN, PAN, notes, and associated tasks with statistics (total, completed, in-progress, pending), with edit functionality.
frontend/src/pages/ClientsPage.tsx: React page component for managing clients with search, filtering, bulk selection, bulk delete, and dialogs for creating/uploading clients. Uses hooks for data fetching and mutations.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard page displaying statistics (clients, tasks, assignees), revenue aggregations by category/subcategory, status breakdowns, and upcoming/overdue tasks with navigation to filtered task views.
frontend/src/pages/TasksPage.tsx: Comprehensive tasks page with search, multi-column filtering (status, category, subcategory, overdue), sorting, bulk operations (edit, delete), inline editing, and Excel export functionality.
frontend/src/pages/TodosPage.tsx: Todos management page with search, completion filtering, bulk selection/deletion, and dialogs for creating/editing/uploading todos. Sorts by completion status and creation date.
frontend/src/utils/assigneeCsv.ts: Utility functions for generating assignee CSV templates, parsing CSV files with validation, and converting parsed rows to backend format for bulk upload.
frontend/src/utils/clientCsv.ts: Utility functions for generating client CSV templates, parsing CSV files with quote-aware parsing and validation, and converting rows to backend format for bulk upload.
frontend/src/utils/taskAggregations.ts: Provides aggregation functions for task data, calculating statistics like revenue by category/subcategory, status breakdowns, and comprehensive task stats including open/completed counts and total revenue.
frontend/src/utils/taskCsv.ts: Handles CSV parsing and validation for bulk task uploads, including template generation, date/number parsing, and validation of required fields with support for quoted CSV values.
frontend/src/utils/taskDisplay.ts: Provides consistent formatting utilities for task display including date formatting, currency formatting (INR), optional text placeholders, and assignee names with captain information.
frontend/src/utils/taskExcel.ts: Exports tasks to Excel format by dynamically loading SheetJS library from CDN and converting task data to Excel-friendly format with formatted dates, currency, and status labels.
frontend/src/utils/taskSort.ts: Implements sorting functionality for tasks across multiple fields (dates, status, category, client, assignee, bill) with ascending/descending direction support and null-safe comparisons.
frontend/src/utils/todoCsv.ts: Handles CSV template generation, parsing, and validation for bulk todo uploads with support for title, description, completed status, priority, and due date fields.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for extracting and managing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence and parameter cleanup functionality.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with dark mode support, custom color palette using OKLCH color space, extended typography/container/animation settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state document for a tax consulting task/client management app, tracking architectural decisions, known issues (blank screens, task editing failures, slow updates), and existing features including Internet Identity authentication and CRUD operations for tasks/clients/assignees.
